information: The company LA FONTE ARDENNAISE, is a Manufacturer/ Producer, founded in 1966, which operates in the Iron, special grade and pig iron industry. It also operates in the Iron, pig, Steels and metals - machining, Robotics, and metal assembly work industries. It is based in Vivier-Au-Court, France.
